com.ibm.watson.dsm.services.dataHandler

Class DataHandler

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.ibm.watson.dsm.services.dataHandler.DataHandler
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    IDataHandler

    public class DataHandler
extends java.lang.Object
implements IDataHandler
    class implements data sharing layer. handles duplicate data detection, saving and retrieving data to and from DSM, and managing local repository.
    Author:
    rbdilmag Yu-Ting Yu
